NSArray * selectedObjects

Detailed Description

Adds some fairly generic features to NSOutlineView.

The delegate of a BkmxOutlineView must be connected in Interface Builder to the window controller

Member Function Documentation

- (id) selectedObject  

Returns the single selected object in the receiver, or an NSNull if there is a multiple selection.

Changes in this value can be observed by KVO and also a binding is exposed.

- (NSArray*) selectedObjects  

Returns the array of objects in the receiver that are selected.

Changes in this value can be observed by KVO and also a binding is exposed.
